name: Wind Fisher
description: There is on shore ; there is off shore ; and there is high altitude wind. We develop a revolutionary concept for high altitude wind energy: safer, lighter, quicker, and more cost-effective. We re-invent wind power
one_liner: There is on shore ; there is off shore ; and there is high altitude wind. We develop a revolutionary concept for high altitude wind energy: safer, lighter, quicker, and more cost-effective. We re-invent wind power
